Detailed Description

RF 802.15.4 modules constant and stuctures.

Define Documentation

#define ACTIVE_SCAN   0x01
 

Mac-scan constant

#define aMaxPHYPacketSize   127
 

MAC Constant based on to IEEE 802.15.4 standard

#define BI_12   40673
 

Superframe timing value

#define CMD_ASSOC_REQ   1
 

Mac-command-id

#define FC_DST_MODE   0x0C
 

MAC Header masks

#define MC_ALTER_COORD   0x01
 

Mac Capability constant

#define TRUE   1
 

Frame control field, just for 802_15_4_RAW

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum assoc_status_t
 

Association response status

Enumerator:
ASSOC_SUCCESSFUL  Association succesfully.
PAN_AT_CAPACITY  PAN network is full.
ACCESS_DENIED  Access denied by ACL-list.

enum csma_response_t
 

MAC CSMA-process return values

Enumerator:
MAC_TX_SUCCESS  TX complete.
MAC_NO_ACK  NO ack from destination.
MAC_CCA_BUSY  Channel too busy.
MAC_CCA_OK  Channel free.
MAC_NO_TIMESLOT  No time slot before next beacon.

enum mac_control_id_t
 

RF802_15_4 control message-id enumeration

Enumerator:
BEACON_NOTIFY  Beacon notify message to upper layer.
ASSOC_REQ  Association request from upper layer.
ASSOC_IND  Association indication to upper layer.
ASSOC_RESPONSE  Association response from upper layer waiting for client data request mac-command.
ASSOC_CONFIRM  Association confirm to upper layer waiting for client data request mac-command.
DISSASSOC_REQ  Dissassocation request from upper layer.
DISSASSOC_IND  Dissassocation indication to upper layer.
GET_REQ  Get Mac-PIB attribute value message from upper layer.
GET_CONFIRM  Confirm message to GET request to upper layer.
SET_REQ  Set Mac-PIB attribute by gives parameter value message from upper layer.
SET_CONFIRM  Confirm message to SET request to upper layer.
GTS_REQ  GTS request message from upper layer.
GTS_CONFIRM  Confirm message to GTS request message to upper layer.
GTS_IND  GTS indication message to upper layer.
POLL_REQ  Poll request message from upper layer.
COMM_STATUS  Genral communication status message to upper layer.
ORPHAN_IND  Orphan indication message to upper layer.
ORPHAN_RESPONSE  Orphan response message message from upper layer.
SCAN_REQ  Scan request message from upper layer.
SCAN_CONFIRM  Scan result message to upper layer.
START_REQ  Start PAN-network request message from upper layer.
START_CONFIRM  Start PAN-network confirm message to upper layer.
RX_ENABLE_REQ  Receiver enable set by gives time parameter request message from upper layer.
RX_ENABLE_CONFIRM  Confirm message to RX_ENABLE_REQ to upperlayer.
SYNCH_REQ  Synchronization request message from upperlayer.
SYNCH_LOSS_IND  Synchronization lost indication message to upperlayer.
RESET_REQ  Reset MAC-PIB request message from upper layer.
RESET_CONFIRM  Reset MAC-PIB confirm message to upper layer.
ROUTER_START  Start router mode with defined channel, PAN-id & address.
PEND_REQ  FFD device can store data for specified client.
PEND_DATA_NOT_DOWNLOAD  When RFD haven't dowload pending data from coordnator.

enum mac_device_type_t
 

MAC logical Device type

Enumerator:
MAC_RFD_TYPE  Client use RFD, not use dynamical memory management.
MAC_FFD_TYPE  Coordinator / Router use FFD, use dynamical memory management.

enum mac_internal_state_t
 

Mac layers states

enum mac_pib_enum_t
 

MAC-PIB attribute enumeration ID's

Enumerator:
MAC_CURRENT_CHANNEL  Logical channel.
MAC_IEEE_ADDRESS  Long IEEE address.
MAC_CORD_IEEE_ADDRESS  Coordinators Long IEEE address.
MAC_PAN_ID  PAN id.
MAC_SO  Superframe order.
MAC_BO  Beacon Order.
MAC_SHORT_ADDRESS  Hort address.
PENDING_TTL  How many 15 seconds period FFD device store pending data buffer.
RUNNING_MODE  Mac running mode.
ASSOC_PERMIT  Handle assocation permit flag.

enum mac_runnin_mode_t
 

MAC modules running mode

Enumerator:
AD_HOC_MODE  AD-HOC MODE.
BEACON_ENABLE_MODE  Beacon enable client mode.
BEACON_ENABLE_COORD_MODE  Beacon enable Coordinator mode.
ROUTER_MODE  Beacon enable Router mode

enum mac_state_t
 

Mac layers states

Enumerator:
BEACON_TRACK  Active scan & beacon tarckin state,forward only Beacon frame.
DISSCONNECT  Not associated, forward only mac-command-frames and ack.
CONNECT  Device is complete associated with coordinator, forward data- and mac-command frames.
AD_HOC  AD-HOC state, forward data- and ack-frames.

enum mac_tx_engine_state_t
 

Mac layers states

enum synch_lost_reason_t
 

Synhrpnize lost reason enumeration ID's

Enumerator:
PAN_ID_CONFLIGTH  Detect same PAN-id, but source is not current coordinator.
REALIGMENT  Coordinator has change network options.
BEACON_LOST  Not received beacon.
NO_ACK_FROM_COORD  Coordinator has not send response for RFD device

Function call get coordinator address from MAC-PIB.

Parameters:
address poniter for address structure where functions write address information.

API for address decoder use for diffrent device type.

Parameters:
mode RF_DECODER_NONE / RF_DECODER_COORDINATOR / RF_DECODER_ON.

mac_pib_enum_t  type
) 
 

Function is for set up some MAC-PIB parameters.

Parameters:
pointer to set up arguments.
type type attribute for MAC-PIB parameter.

void rf_802_15_4_ip_layer_address_mode_set (  uint8_t  support_short_addr  ) 
 

Function setup IP modules address mode and also forward MAC and short address information.

Parameters:
support_short_addr 1=Support & 0=Not support.

void rf_802_15_4_pib_reset (  void   ) 
 

Reset MAC PIB information structure.

This function call when want to initialize MAC PIB to default values.
